title: GPA Calculator - Calculate Your Semester & Cumulative GPA

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: \text{Cumulative GPA} = \frac{(\text{Prev. GPA} \times \text{Prev. Credits}) + \text{Semester Points}}{\text{Prev. Credits} + \text{Semester Credits}}
formulas.raw: \text{Cumulative GPA} = \frac{(\text{Prev. GPA} \times \text{Prev. Credits}) + \text{Semester Points}}{\text{Prev. Credits} + \text{Semester Credits}}
